text: these recent photos show Chelsea Manning
in an all-male military prison where
she's been held for the past seven years
she fought to receive gender
reassignment surgery to transition to
life as a woman it was while she was
still Bradley Manning that she was
convicted of one of the largest leaks of
government information in US history the
private in the US Army Manning hacked
government databases handing hundreds of
thousands of classified documents to the
WikiLeaks organization including State
Department cables which revealed the
private thoughts of US officials and
this video of a u.s. Apache helicopter
strike in Iraq which killed civilians
and journalists Manning was hailed a
whistleblower by supporters and after a
long campaign her sentence was commuted
by President Obama in one of his final
acts in office it was a move criticized
by Donald Trump who branded Manning a
traitor even after her release she'll
remain a member of the US military
without pay but with health care she
appeals her conviction if we lose she
will be dishonorably discharged
ultimately from the Army but there is no
way that she's going back to prison her
sentence is over but the appeal
continues in a statement ahead of her
release she said for the first time I
can see a future for myself as Chelsea I
can imagine surviving and living as the
person who I am and could finally be in
the outside world
